message:
Claude response text: Great! I can confirm that you've successfully completed your objective of navigating through Mount Moon and exiting to Route 4. You're now standing outside the Pokémon Center on Route 4.

Since your Pokémon team looks healthy with full HP, we don't necessarily need to visit the Pokémon Center right now. Let's explore Route 4 a bit more by heading to the right, which should lead us toward Cerulean City.
text_content:
Great! I can confirm that you've successfully completed your objective of navigating through Mount Moon and exiting to Route 4. You're now standing outside the Pokémon Center on Route 4.

Since your Pokémon team looks healthy with full HP, we don't necessarily need to visit the Pokémon Center right now. Let's explore Route 4 a bit more by heading to the right, which should lead us toward Cerulean City.
